title: 문술미래전략대학원 ＜미래연구 웨비나＞ 개최 안내 (11／5(금), 20：00)
content: title:문술미래전략대학원 ＜미래연구 웨비나＞ 개최 안내 (11／5(금), 20：00) date:0000-00-00T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=9925&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:Zoom Link: https://kaist.zoom.us/j/83505062150?pwd=SEQ0SFU4MTcxOEJJL0w0TWljWnplQT09 OR (Meeting ID: 835 0506 2150; Passcode: 553620) . Topic: Global Health Challenge and Humanitarian Future: Pandemic, Conflict, and Technological Innovations Moderator: Sangyoon Yi (Professor, Moon Soul Graduate School of Future Strategy, KAIST) Presenter: 1. Marine Buissonniere (Former Secretary-general of Doctors Without Borders), Humanitarian Future: Pandemic, Conflict & Technology 2. Hani Kim (Executive Director, Right Fund), Reimagining global health partnerships 3. Sven-Christian Schmidt (Head of Dept. of Surgery, Ernst von Bergmann Klinikum Potsdam), German-North Korea Knowledge Exchange in Medical Science Discussant: 1. Eun-Jeung Lee (Dean, Department of History and Cultural Studies, Freie Universität Berlin) 2. JIho Cha (Professor, Moon Soul Graduate School of Future Strategy, KAIST) location: Zoom tag:csweb.calendar
